page.title: 15A Day in the Life of Lucy
page.content:
This is the diary account of an 8 year old school girl.
In the morning I woke up and did all the things I usually do, like getting dressed, washing and having breakfast. At ten to nine Alison and Andrew called and we went to school. After school I played with Alison and Clare with dolls, and we dressed up. At 5 o'clock Clare and I had to go home for tea. After tea I went to my ballet class in Chippenham. I am in Grade 2 now, as I passed my last exam. I got commended. My ballet lesson goes on from 6.15 to 7.00 pm. I came home and had a slice of swiss roll and a glass of water. I played a game of Yakzee on the computer before going to bed.
